Plot: A dramatization of the Kennedy administration's struggle to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis in October 1962.
Title: Thirteen Days
Writer: David Self, Ernest R. May (book), Philip D. Zelikow (book)
Actors: Shawn Driscoll, Kevin Costner, Drake Cook, Lucinda Jenney
tomatoConsensus: Thirteen Days offers a compelling look at the Cuban Missile Crisis, and its talented cast deftly portrays the real-life people who were involved.
